channel.title: Error connecting ( Someone help pleasee willing to pay rsgp)
channel.description: Hey, im using a source and client that works perfectly fine.. i can play on the server when i change the ip to "0.0.0.0" but when i change it to my no-ip address (e.g. "runescape.no-ip.biz") and compile it i can nolonger connect to the server, i think i'm port forwarded i'm really unsure what is happening.. All help will be appreciated. Thanks:)

item.title: Error connecting ( Someone help pleasee willing to pay rsgp)
item.dc:creator: @smeego smeego
item.description:
@smeego wrote:

help is free on here, and double check you have port forward and your client ip matches your source ip

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting ( Someone help pleasee willing to pay rsgp)
item.dc:creator: @t7evious t7evious
item.description:
@t7evious wrote:

Hey, im using a source and client that works perfectly fine… i can play on the server when i change the ip to “0.0.0.0” but when i change it to my no-ip address (e.g. “runescape.no-ip.biz”) and compile it i can nolonger connect to the server, i think i’m port forwarded i’m really unsure what is happening… All help will be appreciated.
Thanks:)
